message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. This gives us both a good share.
Your turn Alice. I need a bit more than that to make it worthwhile.  This seems fair.
Okay, Bob, let's meet in the middle. This offer reflects the time pressure we both face.
Time is running out Alice.  We need to settle this.  This is my final offer.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. We need to agree on a fair split, and an even 50/50 is the most logical solution at this point.
